indexes.definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX customers_pkey ON sales_schema.customers USING btree (customer_id)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX orders_pkey ON ONLY sales_schema.orders USING btree (order_id, order_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_orders_customer ON ONLY sales_schema.orders USING btree (customer_id)

CREATE INDEX orders_2025_jan_customer_id_idx ON sales_schema.orders_2025_jan USING btree (customer_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX orders_2025_feb_pkey ON sales_schema.orders_2025_feb USING btree (order_id, order_date)
CREATE INDEX orders_2025_feb_customer_id_idx ON sales_schema.orders_2025_feb USING btree (customer_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX products_pkey ON sales_schema.products USING btree (product_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_products_category ON sales_schema.products USING btree (category_id)

CREATE INDEX idx_order_items_product ON sales_schema.order_items USING btree (product_id)
